enhanced_description: CompUp is an HR technology solution designed to empower total rewards teams by providing a comprehensive platform for fair and equitable compensation management. It enables organizations to effectively close the pay gap and establish a robust compensation structure. The platform offers capabilities to create and share secure compensation bands, conduct budget simulations, manage employee increments, and auto-generate rewards, streamlining the entire total rewards package communication process into a single, unified system. With a focus on making compensation decisions scientific, seamless, and equitable, CompUp helps master organizational costs through data-driven compensation strategies. It also integrates functionalities for crafting compelling job offers and engaging candidate workflows (via HireSure.ai) and provides people analytics to unlock workforce insights for data-supported strategic HR decisions.
